mapper.select: SELECT BACKLOG_CONTENT FROM BACKLOG WHERE BACKLOG_CONTENT = #{backlogContent} ORDER BY BACKLOG_NO ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BACKLOG ( BACKLOG_NO ,BACKLOG_NAME ,BACKLOG_CONTENT ,BACKLOG_STATUS ,BACKLOG_PRIORITY ,PROJECT_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_BACKLOG_NO.NEXTVAL, #{backlogName}, #{backlogContent}, #{backlogStatus}, #{backlogPriority}, #{projectNo} )
